csr.uart.tx_trigger

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0xc
Size:
0x4
Source:
csr.rdl

Description

UART Tx Trigger Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:1] - - - -
[0] write rw 0x0 csr.uart.tx_trigger.write

Field Descriptions

write - csr.uart.tx_trigger.write

Indicates valid data transfer from the CPU to the UART, used internally - don't try to read or write!
